identity.name: Competitive Intelligence Agent
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster layouts with SaaS utility.
Content is King: Data is the hero.
Zoom In: Focus on the insight, not the noise.

typography.rules: Headings must be bold and dark. Body text should have relaxed line-height for readability.

colors.usage: Use 'Slate' scale for neutrals. Primary Indigo is for CTAs and active states only. Background should be Slate-50, not pure white.

strategies: Use 'Grid Borders' style for dashboards: borders between grid items, no outer borders.
Mobile-First: Stack all grids to 1 column on mobile.
Sidebar Navigation: Fixed left sidebar for desktop, drawer for mobile.

styling.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for dropdowns/modals

specific_components.Card: Flat, 1px border, white background. No shadow by default.
specific_components.Button: Sharp corners or small radius (rounded-md). High contrast.
specific_components.Table: Clean rows, border-b only. Hover state on rows.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 for sticky headers.
visual_enhancers.gradients: No large background gradients. Subtle mesh gradients allowed in empty states only.
visual_enhancers.charts: Recharts (via Shadcn). Prefer Bar Charts for comparisons. Use Indigo palette for data series.

images.rules: Use the provided image for the Auth pages background with an overlay (white/90) to ensure text readability.

universal_guidelines.file_extension: Use .js and .jsx for all React files. Do not use .ts or .tsx.
universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements must have a 'data-testid' attribute (kebab-case).
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratio of 4.5:1. Use semantic HTML.
universal_guidelines.code_style: Functional components. Named exports for components, default exports for pages.

instructions_to_main_agent: Initialize a React app (Vite) if not present.
Install Tailwind CSS and configure with the 'Slate' and 'Indigo' palette.
Create a 'components/ui' folder and implement basic Shadcn-like components (Button, Input, Card, Label) manually in .jsx as Shadcn CLI is TS-first.
Implement the 'Dashboard' using the Bento Grid layout.
Use the provided image for the Login page background.
